decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The works to which this consent relates, must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.
Reason: To accord with the provisions of Section 18(1) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation areas) Act 1990.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: [A715/PM01/C, A715/PM02/C, A715/PM03/B, A715/PM04/C, A715/PM06/B, A715/PM07/A, A715/L1, A715/PL01/D, A715/PL02/D, A715/PL03/D, A715/PL04/D, A715/PL05/C, A715/PL06/B, A715/PL07/A, Planning Statement and Design and Access Statement, Heritage Statement and Heritage and Planning Assessment Addendum. Received: 01/07/2024].
Reason: In order to ensure the development is carried out in accordance with the planning permission.

Condition : 3 - All new internal and external works, including works of making good for the retained fabric, shall match the original work in type, colour, texture, profile and dimensions of materials and in detailed execution, including facebond and pointing. 
Reason: In order to safeguard the special architectural or historic features of the listed building (and/or the character of the Conservation Area).
description: Listed building consent for the change of use from three self-contained flats into a single family house with the erection of a replacement single storey rear extension with roof terrace, a rear infill conservatory and a single storey side extension with rear roof windows, installation of a new front garden fence and bin store, repositioned front door, additional internal and external alterations including installation of a roof lantern, revised rear external doors and side screen; alterations to windows on the side elevation
reference_no_of_permission_being_relied_: Relevant previous approvals: P/2022/3762 and P/2022/3765. Proposed NMA to the Full Planning permission submitted in conjunction with this LBC.
